org.jetel.data

Class Token

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.DataRecord
      • org.jetel.data.DataRecordImpl
        • org.jetel.data.Token
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>, java.lang.Iterable<DataField>

    public class Token
extends DataRecordImpl
    Token is simple extension of DataRecord, which is used in jobflow run of a graph. Token identifier is an artificial key which is used for detailed tracking of token. All components use Tokens instead of DataRecords in case the graph is running in jobflow mode.
    See Also:
    TokenTracker, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Token(DataRecordMetadata metadata)
      Use DataRecordFactory.newRecord(DataRecordMetadata) instead direct call this constructor.

      • serializeUnitary

        public void serializeUnitary(CloverBuffer buffer)
        Description copied from class: DataRecordImpl
        Unitary deserialization should be compatible with unitary serialization. Moreover this type of unitary serialization and deserialization should be compatible with all descendants of DataRecord - for now it is only Token and DataRecord. So for example serialized DataRecord can be deserialized into Token and vice versa.
        Overrides:
        serializeUnitary in class DataRecordImpl

      • getSizeSerializedUnitary

        public int getSizeSerializedUnitary()
        Description copied from class: DataRecordImpl
        Size of unitary serialization form of this data record. Unitary deserialization should be compatible with unitary serialization. Moreover this type of unitary serialization and deserialization should be compatible with all descendants of DataRecord - for now it is only Token and DataRecord. So for example serialized DataRecord can be deserialized into Token and vice versa.
        Overrides:
        getSizeSerializedUnitary in class DataRecordImpl

      • copyFrom

        public void copyFrom(DataRecord fromRecord)
        Description copied from class: DataRecordImpl
        Set fields by copying the fields from the record passed as argument. Does not assume that both records have the right same structure - i.e. metadata.
        Overrides:
        copyFrom in class DataRecordImpl
        Parameters:
        fromRecord - DataRecord from which to get fields' values
